printed_text:
The Corp cannot score an agenda during the same turn they installed that agenda.
When the Corp purges virus counters, trash this program.
stripped_printed_text: The Corp cannot score an agenda during the same turn they installed that agenda. When the Corp purges virus counters, trash this program.

flavor: "The Valley is littered with good ideas. You need the discipline to execute if you want to stay in my incubator."
printed_text: The first time you install a card each turn (including Paige Piper), you may search your stack for any number of copies of that card and add them to your heap. Shuffle your stack.
stripped_printed_text: The first time you install a card each turn (including Paige Piper), you may search your stack for any number of copies of that card and add them to your heap. Shuffle your stack.

flavor: Turns a night owl into an early bird!
printed_text: The first time each turn you lose [click] except by paying the trigger cost of a paid ability, gain [click].
stripped_printed_text: The first time each turn you lose click except by paying the trigger cost of a paid ability, gain click.

printed_text: If you have at least 2[link], the memory cost of this program is 0[mu], even if it is not installed. This program gets +1 strength for each installed icebreaker. Interface â†’ [trash]: Break up to 3 barrier subroutines.
stripped_printed_text: If you have at least 2 link, the memory cost of this program is 0 mu, even if it is not installed. This program gets +1 strength for each installed icebreaker. Interface -> trash: Break up to 3 barrier subroutines.

flavor: Watch out fellas, this little lady's on the prowl!
printed_text: The first time you make a successful run each turn, the Corp reveals 1 card at random from HQ.
stripped_printed_text: The first time you make a successful run each turn, the Corp reveals 1 card at random from HQ.

flavor: "These g-mods haven't hit the consumer market yet, but I can hook you up."
printed_text: Genetics also trigger the second time each turn their trigger condition is met.
stripped_printed_text: Genetics also trigger the second time each turn their trigger condition is met.

printed_text: The first time you take damage each turn, draw 1 card.
stripped_printed_text: The first time you take damage each turn, draw 1 card.

printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The advancement requirement of each agenda is increased by 1 for each copy of that agenda in the Corp's score area.
stripped_printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The advancement requirement of each agenda is increased by 1 for each copy of that agenda in the Corp's score area.

printed_text: The first time you spend [click] to draw 1 card (not through a card ability) each turn, gain 1[credit].
stripped_printed_text: The first time you spend click to draw 1 card (not through a card ability) each turn, gain 1 credit.

flavor: In the vast universe of memories, consciousness slumbers...
printed_text: The rez cost of bioroid ice is lowered by 1 for each unspent click the Runner has.
stripped_printed_text: The rez cost of bioroid ice is lowered by 1 for each unspent click the Runner has.

flavor: "God in Heinlein. What's next, NEXT Platinum?" -John Masanori
printed_text: X is the number of rezzed NEXT ice. [subroutine] Do X net damage. [subroutine] Trash X programs.
stripped_printed_text: X is the number of rezzed NEXT ice. Subroutine Do X net damage. Subroutine Trash X programs.

printed_text: Before taking your first turn, you may switch this identity with any copy of Jinteki Biotech. [click][click][click]: Flip this identity. The Brewery: When you flip this identity, do 2 net damage. The Tank: When you flip this identity, shuffle all cards in Archives into R&D. The Greenhouse: When you flip this identity, place 4 advancement counters on 1 installed card that you can advance.
stripped_printed_text: Before taking your first turn, you may switch this identity with any copy of Jinteki Biotech. click click click: Flip this identity. The Brewery: When you flip this identity, do 2 net damage. The Tank: When you flip this identity, shuffle all cards in Archives into R&D. The Greenhouse: When you flip this identity, place 4 advancement counters on 1 installed card that you can advance.

flavor: "The best part of our work is that nothing is ever wasted. A gene that is useful once will surely be useful again." -Wong Ya Ching
printed_text: When you score Genetic Resequencing, you may place 1 agenda counter on an agenda in your score area.
stripped_printed_text: When you score Genetic Resequencing, you may place 1 agenda counter on an agenda in your score area.

flavor: The more power a spike process can use, the harder it can hit. The really clever ones borrow the runner's own memory to iterate locally.
printed_text: [subroutine] Do 1 net damage for each unused MU the Runner has.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine Do 1 net damage for each unused MU the Runner has.

printed_text: Whenever the Runner fully breaks a piece of ice protecting this server, they get -1 maximum hand size until the beginning of your next turn. Limit 1 region per server.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever the Runner fully breaks a piece of ice protecting this server, they get -1 maximum hand size until the beginning of your next turn. Limit 1 region per server.

flavor: "It tracks you and logs you. If you get in you can just delete the log. But first you have to get in." -Gabriel Santiago
printed_text: [subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag. If this run is successful, the Runner removes 1 tag.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine Give the Runner 1 tag. If this run is successful, the Runner removes 1 tag.

printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. As an additional cost to steal an agenda, the Runner must pay 2[credit].
stripped_printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. As an additional cost to steal an agenda, the Runner must pay 2 credits.

flavor: Give a man money, and he is rich for a day. Teach a man how to invest, and he is rich for life.
printed_text: [click]: Gain 2[credit].
stripped_printed_text: click: Gain 2 credits.

flavor: "Negotiation is an art, so never negotiate when you can intimidate instead." -Thiago Reyes, VP Strategic Operations
printed_text:
2[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability.
[subroutine] The Corp gains 2[credit].
[subroutine] Trash 1 program.
stripped_printed_text: 2 credits: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine The Corp gains 2 credits. Subroutine Trash 1 program.

flavor: "Don't worry. If this one fails, we can start a new one tomorrow."
printed_text: When your turn begins, you may trash Tech Startup. If you do, search R&D for an asset, reveal it, and install it. Shuffle R&D.
stripped_printed_text: When your turn begins, you may trash Tech Startup. If you do, search R&D for an asset, reveal it, and install it. Shuffle R&D.
